rules_text:
Flying
Whenever Aeon Drifter blocks a creature, you may exile Aeon Drifter and put a time counter on it.
Suspend 2–{2}{U} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{U} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)[/i]
